org.cyclops.cyclopscore.network

Class PacketHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.network.PacketHandler

  • @ChannelHandler.Sharable
public final class PacketHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Advanced packet handler of PacketBase instances. An alternative would be SimpleNetworkWrapper. Partially based on the SecretRooms mod packet handling: https://github.com/AbrarSyed/SecretRoomsMod-forge
